recommendations: Dr. Debra Amidon “Some communications experts are good face-to-face. Others are diligent with documenting key trends and events. But it is rare the one we can call a journalist able of analyzing implications 'real-time'. Madan has been a unique and vital window into the true connection between knowledge management and technology for decades”
